pathAssistantSteps.info:
To advance to the Won stage: Ensure you have confirmation from the prospect that Retool is 100% technically validated, meets their requirements, and is either the vendor of choice or is a top choice (contingent on commercials). Then:


  • Complete the Production Use Cases and Production Details sections
  • Click Next Stage


If you have confirmation that Retool lost the Technical Evaluation, click Close Lost. If the evaluation terminated prematurely for non-technical reasons (e.g. commercial misalignment), select the Evaluation Incomplete Lost Reason

To advance to the Evaluation stage: Ensure you have a completed evaluation plan that has been agreed upon by both the Retool account team and the prospect. Then:


  • Complete all fields in the Evaluation Overview and Evaluation Details sections
  • Click Next Stage


If you have confirmation that Retool lost the Technical Evaluation or that it never started, click Close Lost. If the evaluation terminated prematurely for non-technical reasons (e.g. commercial misalignment), select the Evaluation Incomplete Lost Reason
